items.value: are you ready for Big Business?
You can be my Business Partner and i will help you in the future!

Hello my Name is Ivan,
would you like to be my Business Partner?

But you need to own at least € 1.000 Cash.
I cant work with you if you have less!
* clears throat *
yo... you want € 1.000 from me or what?
i have € 1.000 and lets start Business!

No I don't want the € 1.000
You just have to have it in your Wallet.

I am only concerned with the security that you are also able to do Business. I can't do Business with poor ones!
sounds legit! where did we stop?
I do not trust you! I prefer to go on ...

A wise decision!
From now on you can get Orders from me that will reward you abundantly. I always have to meet a wide variety of Customer requirements and always need active Support!

You get:
1x Business Life Book
1x Business Backpack
Roger Ivan, i will be back!

I'm sorry but you don't have enough Money!
I can only do Business with People who are capable for it.

Come back when you have at least € 1.000
